sentences.en: Almost in the same instant a blissful, healing warmth spread all through his body.
sentences.cn: 就在这当儿,一阵舒服的暖意马上传遍了他的全身.
阳光下无忧无虑的日子

sentences.en: But I have to admit that I preferred blissful, deceiving ignorance.
sentences.cn: 但是我必须承认我更喜欢幸福的, 自欺的愚昧.

sentences.en: He fell into a strange, blissful reverie.
sentences.cn: 他沉溺在一种奇怪的, 幸福的幻觉之中.

sentences.en: I caress you, let you taste us , just so blissful listen.
sentences.cn: 我爱抚着你, 让你品位这一切, 快乐的聆听.

sentences.en: I had nine blissful hours of sleep.
sentences.cn: 我无忧无虑地酣睡了九个小时.

sentences.en: I saw that his cheeks were wet and a blissful smile was on his face.
sentences.cn: 我发现他的脸颊挂着泪珠,面上露出了幸福的微笑.

sentences.en: My rest might have been blissful enough, but a sad heart broke it.
sentences.cn: 我的休息原来可以十分安乐; 只是一颗悲伤的心破坏了它.
我的假期过得愉快极了.

sentences.en: She remained in blissful ignorance of these events.
sentences.cn: 她有幸一直不知道这些事情.

sentences.en: So I passed that blissful night.
sentences.cn: 我就这样度过了那个快乐无比的晚上.

sentences.en: The men contemplated the treasure awhile in blissful silence.
sentences.cn: 那两个男人对着宝箱,喜滋滋的,不言不语.

sentences.en: The two men contemplated the treasure a while in blissful silence.
sentences.cn: 那两个人欢欢喜喜,不言不语,对这份财宝注视了一会儿.

sentences.en: We have blissful memories of a summer vacation.
sentences.cn: 暑假里的快乐时光仍留在我们的记忆中.

sentences.en: We spent a blissful week together.
sentences.cn: 我们一起度过了非常快乐的一周。

sentences.en: We spent three blissful weeks away from work.
sentences.cn: 我们无忧无虑地度了三个星期的假。

phrases.tran_cn: 对重要（或不愉快）的事情的全然不知

trans.tran_cn: 极快乐的，极幸福的，充满喜悦的，有造化的，极乐
